        Process a Jooby application and collect RouteSpec.
        Parameters:
        app - A jooby app to process.

      • compile

        public List<RouteSpec> compile(Jooby app,
                               Path srcdir,
                               Path outdir)
        Process a Jooby application and collect RouteSpec, but also save a compiled version in the given outdir.
        Parameters:
        app - A jooby app to process.
        srcdir - Basedir where source code is located. Useful for extracting doc.
        outdir - Where to save the compiled route specs.
        Returns:
        List of route specs.

        routes - Routes to process.

      • compile

        public List<RouteSpec> compile(Class<? extends Jooby> appClass,
                               List<Route.Definition> routes,
                               Path srcdir,
                               Path outdir)
        Process a Jooby application and collect RouteSpec.
        Parameters:
        appClass - A jooby app to process.
        routes - Routes to process.
        srcdir - Basedir where source code is located. Useful for extracting doc.
        outdir - Strategy where to save the compiled route specs.
        Returns:
        List of route specs.
